message: Let's be fair and start with a good foundation. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can always adjust it later!
I think a 60/40 split is a fairer starting point. It allows for room to negotiate further.
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is still too much for me.  Let's try 70/30. We both get a decent amount, and we can avoid further rounds of inflation.
